name: Complete Product Hunt Launch Checklist 2025
description: Product Hunt Launch Checklist is a comprehensive & actionable resource to prepare for the Product Hunt launch. It's packed with 12 planning checklists, tips, guides, resources, tools and community. Available for Airtable, Google Sheets, and Notion.You'll get access to✅ 200+ actionable tips✅ All tips can be filtered based on impact & effort✅ 12 checklists to prepare your launch✅ 60+ places to share Product Hunt launch✅ 30+ useful tools✅ 10+ best launch case-studies✅ Product Hunt community
features: 1 month before — 12 tips; 1 week before — 24 tips; 1 day before — 16 tips; Launch day — 42 tips; After launch — 32 tips; Launch kit — 16 tips; Places to share PH launch — 67 places; People section — to get the maximum support; Tools — 30 tools; Resources — 10 tips
